## Steps to reproduce

On Windows

``` powershell
set-ExecutionPolicy Restricted  -Force -Scope Process
'write-verbose "test" -verbose' | Out-File -FilePath .\test.ps1                                           
.\test.ps1                                                                                                
```
## Expected behavior

it should fail with an error like the following

```
.\test.ps1 : File C:\Users\tplunk\test.ps1 cannot be loaded because running scripts is disabled on this system. For
more information, see about_Execution_Policies at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=135170.
At line:1 char:1
+ .\test.ps1
+ ~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : SecurityError: (:) [], PSSecurityException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : UnauthorizedAccess
```
## Actual behavior

> VERBOSE: test
